text: He adamaka santati! Yasto nahos ki saitana timila'i phaka'era kunai noksanima paros jasto ki timro ama buvala'i phaka'era svargabata niskasita gara'ihalyo ra tiniharula'i bastrahina garayo ki tinaka guptanga eka arkala'i dekha'ide'os. Tyasale ra tyasako samuhale timila'i yasto tha'umbata herirakhdachan ki timile dekhna sakdainau. Hamile yi saitanaharula'i tinaka mitra bana'idi'eka chaum jasale imana lya'umdainan
